messages.content: FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I change my FS password?

To change your FS password, start by logging into FS. Enter the temporary password you were given and click on 'Change Password'. Enter your old password once and then your new password twice. Your new password must be 12 characters long. For more information, check the link in the password change window.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
What are some useful FS hotkeys?
Some useful FS hotkeys include Ctrl+F for search mode, Ctrl+L to clear search fields, Ctrl+R for register mode, and Ctrl+N to insert new rows. For a comprehensive list, refer to our FS hotkey guide.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I register a new course in FS?

To register a new course in FS, use the Emneplanlegger p√• nett (EpN). Start by selecting 'New course' in the top menu, fill out all required fields under each tab, and save your progress. Once finished, change the status to 'Ready for FS-clearing' and notify the FS team by email.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I create a faculty member in FS?

To create a faculty member in FS, first ensure they're in the Person/Faculty and Faculty collection image. Enter their details in 'Person/Faculty' for manual entry if not automatically transferred from SAP. Remember to activate them by setting 'Active' to 'J'.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How does FS integrate with Canvas?

FS integration with Canvas updates hourly for new rooms, students, and teaching assignments based on FS entries. Ensure teaching units and activities are correctly registered in FS to appear in Canvas. For detailed integration processes, consult the FS to Canvas guide.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How can I access FS remotely?

For remote access to FS, you'll need to use the VPN service provided by UIA. Once connected to the VPN, navigate to the FS login page as you would on campus. Ensure you have the necessary permissions and correct login credentials.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
I'm having trouble logging into FS, what should I do?

If you're experiencing login issues with FS, first ensure you're using the correct credentials. If the problem persists, try resetting your password. For further assistance, contact the FS support team with details of the issue.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I register for courses in FS?

To register for courses in FS, navigate to the 'Course Registration' section under your student profile. Search for the course you wish to enroll in, and follow the prompts to complete the registration process. If you encounter any issues, consult the FS user guide or contact support.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
Where can I find my course materials in FS?

Course materials in FS can typically be found under the 'Course Information' section for each enrolled course. This may include syllabi, lecture notes, and additional resources provided by your instructors. If you cannot find the materials, contact your course instructor for guidance.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
I found an error in FS, how do I report it?

To report an error in FS, please document the issue with as much detail as possible, including screenshots if applicable, and send the information to the FS support team via email or the support portal. Provide your contact information for follow-up if necessary.
